page.title: 02CHESTERTON SURVEY
page.content: We surveyed 116 families and found that: HOUSING 58 lived in semi-detached homes,36 in detached,18 in terraced,3 in bungalows and 1 in a flat.31 families had lived in Chesterton for 7 years or more,45 had moved from elsewhere in Cirencester,12 from elsewhere in Glos. 35 from Gt.Britain & 3 from overseas. 44 families had moved once before,24 twice,7 three times & 10 more than 3 times. CONSUMER DURABLES 65 families had 1 car 24 families had 2 or more cars 70 owned black & white Televisions 99 owned colour televisions 59 owned a video recorder 8 owned a caravan for holidays 23 owned a trailer tent for holidays 42 owned a boat,usually a dinghy.
